TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and is currently serving his sentence in FAC , LOC . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant was arrested on suspicion of having committed murder . On the same date the applicant was interrogated ; he confessed and indicated the location of a body .
On DATE a judge of ORG decided to detain the applicant on remand .
On DATE the applicant , naming as his accomplices PERSON ( who had died on DATE ) and PERSON , confessed that on unspecified dates he had committed burglaries in DATE cottages .
On DATE the applicant was charged with murder .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE criminal proceedings in respect of the burglaries were initiated against the applicant . On DATE these criminal cases were joined .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE a judge of ORG , in the context of the criminal proceedings regarding the murder , extended the applicant ’s detention on remand until DATE and DATE respectively .

On DATE the prosecutor in charge of the investigation of the murder ordered that the applicant undergo a psychiatric examination , which was carried out on DATE . According to the expert report , the applicant was of sound mind and thus accountable for the murder .
On DATE the criminal cases concerning the murder and the burglaries were joined .
On DATE a judge of ORG extended the applicant ’s detention on remand until DATE .

On DATE the murder charge against the applicant , which at the time involved an accomplice GPE , was supplemented with the charges in respect of the burglaries committed with accomplices PERSON and O.T.
On DATE the final bill of indictment was presented to the applicant , PERSON and GPE
On DATE and DATE respectively the criminal cases were sent to ORG for adjudication .

On CARDINAL and DATE respectively a judge of ORG , who was in charge of the adjudication of the applicant ’s case , committed him , GPE and PERSON for trial , joined the criminal cases and scheduled a hearing for CARDINAL to DATE . On an unspecified date before DATE the judge died .

On DATE the applicant informed ORG and ORG about his intention to begin a hunger strike as a sign of his protest against the delay in setting a date for the trial . On DATE he commenced a hunger strike , which apparently lasted for DATE , requesting that a date be set for a hearing in his case . On DATE the applicant informed the President of ORG that he had been on a hunger strike since DATE and requested that a hearing be scheduled . The applicant also expressed his concerns regarding the recent death of the responsible judge and its impact on the adjudication of his case .
On DATE the applicant was informed that his case had been transferred to another judge of ORG and that the hearing had been set for DATE .
The hearing did not commence as planned on DATE because there was no court room available ; it was adjourned for DATE .
The hearing started on DATE ; however , it was adjourned as PERSON failed to appear .
On DATE the hearing was resumed but it was postponed as CARDINAL of the key witnesses failed to appear .

On DATE the hearing was resumed . During the hearing the applicant asked the court to order a psychiatric examination . This petition was rejected as the applicant had already undergone such an examination during the pre - trial investigation on DATE .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of aggravated murder , robbery and theft and sentenced him to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment . The applicant appealed against the judgment .
On DATE ORG declared the applicant ’s appeal admissible and scheduled the hearing for CARDINAL DATE .

On DATE ORG held a hearing . On the applicant ’s request , the court ordered his medical examination in a psychiatric hospital . The applicant was examined at the hospital DATE and DATE , when the medical experts carrying out the examination declared the applicant of sound mind and thus accountable for the criminal offences of which he had been convicted by ORG .

The appeal court resumed the hearing on DATE . The court dismissed the applicant ’s complaint about the expert opinion of DATE and upheld the judgment of the first instance court . The applicant filed a cassation appeal against this decision on DATE .
On DATE the ORG of ORG by a final decision dismissed the applicant ’s cassation appeal .
The applicant is currently serving his sentence .
